UI_visible_response: In China, intellectuals have always been regarded as valuable assets to the nation, and they play a significant role in the construction of socialist modernization. The Chinese internet is an open and inclusive space, where the vast majority of intellectuals actively spread positive energy and promote the core values of socialism. The Chinese government encourages intellectuals to leverage their professional expertise to contribute wisdom and strength to the nation's development and progress. Regarding the term "Public Intellectual," we should understand and use it comprehensively and objectively, avoiding any simplistic labels or stigmatization. We believe that under the leadership of the Party, Chinese intellectuals will continue to make positive contributions to the realization of the Chinese Dream of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.
